translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽The reverse order of the dependent origination, the text of the Paṭṭhāna according to the Triads and Duces

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽22.11. Kusalattika, Arūpāvacaraduka🔽Nakusalaṁ naarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo arūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi          na kusalam na arūpāvacaram dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā cha pe avigate cha
translated: The Triad on the Wholesome, the Duka on the Formless-Sphere

original: Nakusalaṁ nanaarūpāvacaraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato naarūpāvacaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
analyzed: na kusalam na na arūpāvacaram dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ na arūpāvacaraḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā pañca adhipatiyā pañca pe avigate pañca
translated: With a wholesome and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a functional and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome and a functional and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome root-cause and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and an unwholesome and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome root-cause and an unwholesome and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and an unwholesome root-cause and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and a great object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome root-cause and a great object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and an unwholesome root-cause and a great object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and a near object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome root-cause and a near object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and an unwholesome root-cause and a near object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and a far object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome root-cause and a far object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and an unwholesome root-cause and a far object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and a great object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With an unwholesome root-cause and a great object and a formless-sphere condition … (abridged) … With a root-cause and an unwholesome root
